column2: if a mixed drink could taste like a shoe department store
column3: it would be this one. Also no hint of thai chillies
column4: although I imagine it would've helped. I also noticed the description for this drink excludes "yuzu" on the sake social menu
column5: but "yuzu" is included on the description in the main drink menu. Thought it might've been a typo
column6: but I tasted no yuzu. Interesting...
